      • addSmelterBlastOre

        public static void addSmelterBlastOre(java.lang.String oreType)
        Use this to register an Ore TYPE as a "Blast" recipe - it will require Pyrotheum Dust to smelt. Do not add the prefix. This is an opt-in for ores which do NOT have vanilla furnace recipes. Ex: "Steel" or "ElectrumFlux", not "dustSteel" or "dustElectrumFlux"
        Parameters:
        oreType -
